title: Mobile Suit Gundam 40th Anniversary G40 Project Special Movie
alternative_title: Kidou Senshi Gundam G40, 機動戦士ガンダムG40
description: A short anime as part of "Mobile Suit Gundam 40th Anniversary Project" that promotes the Gundam G40 model kit, a Gundam x Ken Okuyama Design x LDH Japan collaboration. It is a reinterpretation of some famous scenes from the first Gundam television anime.
